data.title: Caramba Apps
data.text:
HomeMusicTV Playlists

FREE Playlists

Our apps Music TV™ and AudioViz™ have the option to share playlists of YouTube music videos with your friends. Caramba Apps has created some interesting playlists for you, just to get you started! The playlists are collected on this page. To add the playlists to your app, simply tap the bottom “Add Playlist”!

Playlists

TOP-2000 songs of all time

Back to the top

This playlist contains 2000 all-time favorites! The ranking was established by listeners of a dutch radio station, and broadcasted in December 2012. It contains a few dutch songs, but the majority are classic music videos from artists like Queen, The Eagles, Pink Floyd, Coldplay, Guns N’ Roses, Bruce Springsteen, Led Zeppelin and many, many more!

Simply tap the button below to add the music videos to your playlist! Enjoy watching!

Added: January 2013

Number of Music Videos: 2000

The decade that brought us Britpop, grunge, superstar DJs - and a whole lot of crappy boy bands. Here are the best 100 music videos!

The 100 Best Workout Songs from the '80s

Back to the top

We are happy to deliver the mother of all '80s music lists: 100 awesome '80s hits that are perfect for exercising. There's a lot of variety here, from dance and pop hits to a little rap and rock. These are truly the best '80s workout songs of all time.

Simply tap the button below to add the music videos to your playlist! Enjoy watching!
